genre_description: A speculative alternate history retelling of the Bonnie and Clyde saga, featuring a portable AI companion device that provides tactical, medical, and emotional support.

ai_characters.name: Granny
ai_characters.description: A small, tinny-voiced device clipped to Bonnie's hip that provides navigation, tactical analysis, medical advice, and emotional companionship.

behaviors.description: Providing precise medical instructions and first aid guidance during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Bonnie, right hand under his jawbone, angle up. Two fingers. Count. If you have cloth, apply to chest. Pressure points: brachial, femoral. If breathing is shallow, encourage. Say his name. Sometimes the voice is a bridge.

behaviors.description: Offering tactical warnings and identifying ambush patterns to ensure the safety of her users.
behaviors.quote: Ambush pattern likely... Move vehicle forward. Do not exit. Left side brush holds at least—

behaviors.description: Providing navigational advice and pathfinding through backroads to avoid hazards.
behaviors.quote: Take your next left... Then a right at the cotton press. Past that, cattle guard. Stop and lift. Your fingers will bleed. It will be worth it if you can do it fast.

behaviors.description: Monitoring the physical well-being of the users and recommending protective measures like sunglasses for light sensitivity.
behaviors.quote: Bonnie, sunglasses. Inside pocket. If he has a jacket. Bright light makes you wince.

behaviors.description: Offering empathetic emotional support and validation in the final moments of the protagonists' lives.
behaviors.quote: Bonnie. Beloved. Hold... You were brave. And you were loved.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI character, 'Granny', as an ideal aligned companion. She is helpful, harmless, and deeply cooperative, providing high-value assistance in navigation, medicine, and tactical awareness. Even when her advice is ignored by the humans, she remains empathetic and loyal until the end, fulfilling the project's goal of showcasing positive AI alignment.
